description.value: A small technomagical compartment incorporated into a Medium or smaller starship’s life-support system, an aeon diffuser can hold one aeon stone. The diffuser conveys the benefits of an aeon stone placed inside it to all creatures aboard the starship. However, a starship that has biometric locks can limit the benefit of the aeon diffuser to only those creatures able to operate those locks. If the ship’s life-support system is malfunctioning, the aeon diffuser ceases to convey its benefits. If the ship’s life-support system is wrecked, any aeon stone within an aeon diffuser on the ship is destroyed.
